text: Yoelbi Luis Quesada Fernández (; born August 4, 1973 in Trinidad, Sancti Spíritus) is a Cuban athlete competing mostly in triple jump. ==Career== He has an Olympic bronze medal, and became world champion in 1997 with a personal best jump of 17.85m. ==Personal best== *Triple jump: 17.85 m (wind: +0.9 m/s) – Athens, 8 August 1997 ==Competition record== {| |- !bgcolor="#eeeeee"
